article_text:
Horse park commission votes for a new director

Lafayette sweeps top seeds to win district title

00:40

article_metadata.title: Barr not true Republican | Lexington Herald-Leader

og.description: I will be voting in the primary to prevent congressman Andy Barr from being reelected. Barr has never met a spending bill he didn’t approve, including funding for Planned Parenthood and Obamacare.
og.title: Barr not true Republican
